short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this on Canvas to grey out completed assignments. Only functions on the Calendar page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a cosmetic effect you can use on Canvas (Instructure) to grey out completed assignments. Once installed, completed assignments on your calendar will change to 1/8th opacity. 
(Only functions on the Calendar page)
